greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: row n lists the proper divisors of n-th even superperfect number A061652(n).
comment: Also, row n list the proper divisors of n-th superperfect number A019279(n), if there are no odd superperfect numbers.
link: Omar E. Pol, Determinacion geometrica de los numeros primos y perfectos".
results.author: _Omar E. Pol_, Apr 22 2008
